home.title: GetLifeUndo - Ctrl+Z for Online Life
home.subtitle: Restore form text, clipboard history, and recently closed tabs. 100% local.
home.description: GetLifeUndo is a browser extension that helps you recover lost text inputs, clipboard history, and recently closed tabs. All data is stored locally on your device for maximum privacy.

about.title: About GetLifeUndo
about.description: GetLifeUndo was created to solve the problem of lost form data and accidentally closed tabs. Our mission is to provide a simple, privacy-focused solution for web users.

features.title: Features & Use Cases
features.description: Discover how GetLifeUndo can help you work more efficiently online.
